page.title: 12Bletchley,Playground Games
page.content: There are many games played in our school playground including football, line tig and rounders.I am going to describe some of the ones you might not know. The game elastics is where you have a piece of elastic and two people hold it round their legs at different heights, and other people have to jump in and out in lots of different ways. Skipping is also very popular,some people do Double Dutch where you have two ropes which you spin inwards one by one and a person has to try to skip with both ropes going at once. Bulldog is another popular game;one person is on and has to try to catch the other children as they run from one side of the playground to the other.When you have been caught you are on as well.
